uvi.product_version: versions from v4.13 to before v5.10.44
uvi.description:
NFS: Fix use-after-free in nfs4_init_client()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.44 by commit c3b6cf64dfe4ef96e7341508d50d6998da7062c7, it was introduced in version v4.13 by commit 8dcbec6d20eb881ba368d0aebc3a8a678aebb1da. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:
